description:
Windows launcher with global hotkey for quick access

QuickDashLauncher is a Windows launcher application that provides quick access to websites, applications, folders, and files via a global hotkey (Alt+Space by default, customizable).

Key Features:
- Fast launch with global hotkey
- Quick access to websites, applications, and folders
- Custom URI scheme support (obsidian://, vscode://, etc.)
- Auto-import folder contents
- Group launch for multiple items
- Modern implementation with Electron + React + TypeScript
